com.business

Class OrderOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.business.OrderOperations

  • public class OrderOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the means for place order and erase orders and order item operations to be made

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • placeOrder

        void placeOrder(java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String lastName,
                java.lang.String productName,
                double productQuantity)
        Checks if the client that places the order and the product being ordered exists in the database. Also it checks if an order for that client exists already in the database.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the client that is placing the order
        lastName - the last name of the client that is placing the order
        productName - the product that is being ordered
        productQuantity - the quantity of the product ordered

      • orderFound

        private void orderFound(Orders foundOrder,
                        OrderItem foundOrderItem,
                        Products foundProduct,
                        double productQuantity)
        Adjusts the order and product stock.
        Parameters:
        foundOrder - The order that already exists in the database for that client.
        foundOrderItem - The product that may have been ordered previously.
        foundProduct - The product that is ordered.
        productQuantity - The quantity of the product.

      • orderNotFound

        private void orderNotFound(OrderItem foundOrderItem,
                           Clients foundClient,
                           Products foundProduct,
                           double productQuantity)
        Places the first order for this client. If the product has been ordered before its orderItem gets updated otherwise gets created.
        Parameters:
        foundOrderItem - The product that may have been ordered previously.
        foundClient - Tha client that is placing the order.
        foundProduct - The product that is ordered.
        productQuantity - The quantity of the product.

      • eraseData

        void eraseData()
        Used to delete all the data that is inside the Orders and OrderItem tables
